description.en: Expansive open-plan living and dining area in Hawthorn tiled with 900x450 timber-look porcelain in a herringbone pattern. Self-levelled over 120 sqm of existing concrete, with underfloor heating integration and colour-matched grouting.
description.zh: Hawthorn开放式客厅与餐厅，采用900x450木纹瓷质砖人字铺贴。120平方米原有混凝土基面自流平处理，集成地暖系统，配色填缝。
